Address.value: 6996 PIAZZA GRANDE AVENUE,SUITE 301, ORLANDO, Florida, 32835, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Falcon's Beyond Global, Inc. is a global entertainment company. The Company's segments include Falcon's Creative Group, LLC (FCG), which focuses on master planning, media and audio production, project management, and hardware development, procurement, and sales for third-party clients; Producciones de Parques, S.L. (PDP) that consists of joint venture with Melia Hotels International, which focuses on the development, ownership and operation of hotel resorts, theme parks and retail, dining, and entertainment (RD&E) zones in Spain; Sierra Parima segment consists of joint venture with Melia Hotels International, which focuses on the development, ownership and operation of hotels resorts, and RD&E zones in Punta Cana; Destinations Operations segment provides development and management services for themed entertainment, and Falcon's Beyond Brands segment consists of development and commercialization of Company owned and third-party intellectual property through consumer products and media.
